execution_quality: High-quality execution with systematic directory creation, file organization, and verification steps. Agent appropriately checked configuration and made architectural decisions transparently.

User's immediate follow-up requesting validation suggests satisfaction, though minor misalignment may exist in exact structural details that testing will reveal.
